rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 20 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 11:42 AM, 21 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Nueva Ecija, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Rizal, Quezon, Laguna, Batangas, Cavite and Tarlac within the next 2 hours.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
